label: Telegram requesting a meeting with Bishop Unterkoefler

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
1024A EST MAR 27 69 AB022
A CNA067 SA PDB CHARLESTON SOCAR 27 1017A EST
ISIAH [Isaiah] BENNETT, 75 Â· DLY PD
655 EAST BAY ST CHARLESTON SOCAR 
BISHOP UNTERKOEFLER REQUESTS YOU MEET WITH HIM SISTER MARIA
ANO HOSPITAL REPRESENTATIVES IN THE BISHOP'S OFFICE 119 BROAD
ST MONDAY MARCH 31ST AT 10AM PLEASE CALL 723-3488 TO CONFIRM
FATHER FRIEND CHANCELLOR

119 31 10AM 723-3488
(1023).
